author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Euromoney Says ‍Total Revenues For Quarter To December 31 Increased By 6%
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Euromoney Institutional Investor Plc :
* ‍TOTAL REVENUES FOR QUARTER TO DECEMBER 31 INCREASED BY 6% TO £100.8M​
* ‍NET DEBT AT DECEMBER 31, 2017 WAS £49.0M​ * ‍UNDERLYING REVENUES INCREASED BY 3% FOR QUARTER TO DECEMBER 31​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
